house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1930 has 2 bedroom(s), 1 bath(s) and approximately 1214 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include private pool.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master
